title: Cauldron (disambiguation)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Cauldron is a big kettle used for cooking or brewing. It can mean any of the following in Old School RuneScape:

content:
A Cauldron is a big kettle used for cooking or brewing. It can mean any of the following in Old School RuneScape:

  • Cauldron, generic non-interactive scenery in Gielinor.
  • Cauldron (Witch's Potion), near Hetty.
  • Cauldron (Black Knights' Fortress), part of the Black Knight's Fortress quest.
  • Cauldron (Goblin Kitchen), used during Recipe for Disaster/Freeing the Goblin generals.
  • Cauldron (Mourner Headquarters), used during the Biohazard quest.
  • Cauldron of Thunder, used during the Druidic Ritual quest.
  • Aggie's Cauldron
  • Betty's cauldron
  • Troll Stew
  • Hetty's empty cauldron
  • Broken cauldron
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
A '''Cauldron''' is a {{WP|cauldron|big kettle used for cooking or brewing}}. It can mean any of the following in ''Old School RuneScape'':

* [[Cauldron]], generic non-interactive scenery in Gielinor.
* [[Cauldron (Witch's Potion)]], near [[Hetty]].
* [[Cauldron (Black Knights' Fortress)]], part of the [[Black Knight's Fortress]] quest.
* [[Cauldron (Goblin Kitchen)]], used during [[Recipe for Disaster/Freeing the Goblin generals]].
* [[Cauldron (Mourner Headquarters)]], used during the [[Biohazard]] quest.
* [[Cauldron of Thunder]], used during the [[Druidic Ritual]] quest.
* [[Aggie's Cauldron]]
* [[Betty's cauldron]]
* [[Troll Stew]]
* [[Hetty's empty cauldron]]
* [[Broken cauldron]]

{{Disambig}}
